message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it holds. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me think about it for a moment. I am willing to offer $1125000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $1175000. I think this is a fair price that balances our interests.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $1150000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $1180000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great price for a product of this value.
I see your point, Alice. I am willing to offer $1165000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1180000, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the value the product brings. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm starting to think I should explore other options. I'll give you one last chance to make a serious offer.
Considering the negotiations, I am willing to offer $1170000 for the product.
